name: True vs. Fake
description:
True Vs. Fake is a small 1vs1 minigame created during the JamToday Granada, 2018.

In a world full of fake news your goal is to convince the world population of such fake news or quite the opossite, to convince them not to believe those news to believe the real ones that you're trying to spread.

Smash those buttons as fast as you can while trying not to make any mistake to get the combos right, you barely have 90s!

(You need 2 controllers to play this game.)
